sentences.en: Dinin took a deep breath and gingerly stepped to the archway.
sentences.cn: 狄宁深吸一口气,小心翼翼地踏进拱门.

sentences.en: Gingerly, she put her hand in deeper, to the bottom.
sentences.cn: 她一只手小心翼翼地往下伸,一直摸到底部.

sentences.en: He gingerly touched his right ankle; it was swelling massively.
sentences.cn: 他小心翼翼地碰了碰右踝, 肿得很厉害.

sentences.en: He sits up in confusion and touches the wound gingerly.
sentences.cn: 他困惑地坐起来小心地摸着受伤的地方.

sentences.en: He tasted the coffee gingerly before drinking it.
sentences.cn: 他在喝咖啡以前先小心地尝一尝.

sentences.en: I drove gingerly past the security check points.
sentences.cn: 我战战兢兢地开车经过安检站。

sentences.en: I tasted blood again gingerly touched my split upper lip.
sentences.cn: 轻舔开裂的上唇,我又尝到血腥味.

sentences.en: In the darkness, he turned to the left, stepping gingerly.
sentences.cn: 在黑暗中, 他向左转, 小心地走着.

sentences.en: Pork beamed under the praise and gingerly rubbed his bandaged leg.
sentences.cn: 阿保听见了这番褒奖,便满面光彩起来,咧着嘴擦着他那已经加上绷带的腿.
她小心翼翼地把它拾起来.
她小心翼翼地摘下那朵花.

sentences.en: She was touching the dressing gingerly with both hands.
sentences.cn: 她双手小心翼翼地抚摸着伤口处的绷带。

sentences.en: The passengers stepped down gingerly from the narrow gangplank.
sentences.cn: 乘客们战战兢兢地从狭窄的跳板上走下船来.

sentences.en: They proceeded with gingerly footwork over the jagged stones.
sentences.cn: 他们在高低不平的石头上迈着谨慎的步伐前行.

sentences.en: Two of the doctors took hold of my right leg very gingerly and bent it.
sentences.cn: 两位医生谨谨慎慎地捺住我的右腿,把它扭弯点.

words.tran_cn: 谨慎的；轻手轻脚的；慎重的

trans.tran_en: If you do something gingerly, you do it in a careful manner, usually because you expect it to be dangerous, unpleasant, or painful
